name: Pack-It Down!
description: Picture this: A new supermarket has emerged, but here the customers just tell what items they want, and then they’ll get it delivered in a paper bag. Well you ended up working here having to pack all the bags. So hurry up, items will fly in from the left and you have to pack them in the bag and give it to the customers on the right, but DON’T drop the items, no one likes a dirty salad.
